page.title: 08DEEPING ST.JAMES NURSERY
page.content: The French Marigold and the salvia suffered the most from this years cold weather.The nursery doesn't have many problems with insects but,if there are the owner keeps his own stock of chem- icals which would take care of that.If necessary the owner can steam clean the greenhouse or get a company to use gas to sterilize the soil. The owner sells his flowers etc.at markets.He sometimes sells them at shows and he also supplies a large garden centre.Regular customers come in to buy flowers.He makes hanging baskets,patio tubs and bouquets for special occasions.
